description: Use njmon on AIX v80+ and InfluxDB2

targets.query:
from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tags")
  |> distinct(column: "architecture")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tags")
  |> distinct(column: "mtm")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tags")
  |> distinct(column: "serial_no")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "config")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "partitionname")
  |> distinct(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_util")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "entitlement")
  |> distinct(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "filesystems")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","filesystem_name", "_value"])

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "aix_technology_level" or r["_field"] == "aix_service_pack" or r["_field"] == "aix_version")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with 
      os_level: "AIX " + 
                string(v: float(v: r["aix_version"])) + " " +
                string(v: if int(v: r["aix_technology_level"]) < 10 then "0" + string(v: int(v: r["aix_technology_level"])) else string(v: int(v: r["aix_technology_level"]))) + " " +
                string(v: if int(v: r["aix_service_pack"]) < 10 then "0" + string(v: int(v: r["aix_service_pack"])) else string(v: int(v: r["aix_service_pack"])))
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "os_level"])

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "config")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nw_adapter")
  |> distinct(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_details")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpus_active")
  |> distinct(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lpar_format1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "smt_threads")
  |> distinct(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_details")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mhz")
  |> distinct(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_physical_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "idle" or r["_field"] == "sys" or r["_field"] == "user" or r["_field"] == "wait")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
      idle: "idle",
      sys: "sys",
      user: "user",
      wait: "wait"
  })
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "idle", "sys", "user", "wait"])

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "days" or r["_field"] == "hours" or r["_field"] == "minutes")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with 
      uptime: string(v: r["days"]) + " days " + string(v: r["hours"]) + " hours " + string(v: r["minutes"]) + " minutes"
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "uptime"])

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_process" or r["_field"] == "real_system" or r["_field"] == "real_free" or r["_field"] == "numperm" or r["_field"] == "real_user" or r["_field"] == "real_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with 
      real_process: r.real_process * 4096.0,
      real_free: r.real_free * 4096.0,
      real_user: r.real_user * 4096.0,
      real_total: r.real_total * 4096.0,
      numperm: r.numperm * 4096.0
  }))
  |> rename(columns: {
      real_process: "Process",
      real_free: "Free",
      real_user: "User",
      numperm: "FSCache",
      real_total: "Total"
  })
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Process", "Free", "User", "FSCache", "Total"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kernel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "run_queue" or r["_field"] == "runocc_average")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
      run_queue: "Run Queue",
      runocc_average: "Avg Qun Queue Occupancy"
  })
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Run Queue", "Avg Qun Queue Occupancy"])

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "busy")
  |> keep(columns: ["disk_name", "_value","_time"])

from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /^${HOST}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "network_adapters")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rx_bytes" or r["_field"] == "tx_bytes")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
      rx_bytes: "rx_bytes",
      tx_bytes: "tx_bytes"
  })
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "rx_bytes", "tx_bytes"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tags")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["os"] == "AIX")
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Hostname
list.name: HOST

query.query:
from(bucket: "njmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tags")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["os"] == "AIX")
  |> distinct(column: "host")

title: njmon for AIX Simple Six v86 with influxdb2
